(4199x243+251)/64 mod 128 = 75. (4199x729+817)/128 mod 64 = 49. (4199x2187+2579)/256 mod 32 = 10. (4199x2187+2579)/512 mod 16 = 5. (4199x6561+8249)/1024 mod 8 = 0. (4199x6561+8249)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (4199x6561+8249)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (4199x6561+8249)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
